name: Bemis Wamilton Racing
description:
Story:

Bemis Wamilton Racing is racing game where player controls Electronic racing cars and player character is Bemis Wamilton. Compete against though opponents in 15 different race tracks. Every track there is 6 AI opponents. Every race is 3 laps races and there is different themed tracks and enviroments.
Player racing car is electronic and it has battery which need charge sometime during race, that happens by reducing speed and braking, so you cant hole time drive full speed. on longer straights player need strategy that where he increase battery capacity.
Every track has checkpoints so player cant take shortcuts or then his lap time will not calculate to results. Player has 3 different camera angle which he can change during game. Also game contains test area where player can test his car features and collect steam achievements. Also driving races, gives player achievements

Features:

- 15 race tracks
- 3 laps races
- Result list
- Steam achievements
- Ai opponents
- test area to test car handling
- 3 different camera angle
